p. 79 / 10 + (5*[BODY and WILL averaged, rounding up])

﻿﻿-2 to all Actions when Seriously Wounded.
p. 79 / Seriously Wounded Wound Threshold is half of their total HP (rounded up).

p. 80 / Humanity (EMP*10)
Potential for cyberpsychosis as it diminishes.

blocks.label:
Hover over dice names to set dice quantity.
Left click icons to roll. Right click icons to add to pool.

meta.helperText:
p. 72 / What are the Statistics? | p. 78 / How do you buy STATS?
Remember, no STAT higher than 8 or lower than 2.

p. 81 / What different Skills are there?
p. 90 / How do you buy Skills?

* / Don't forget your Basic Skills have to be at least Level 2.
Remember, no Skill can be higher than 6.

(x2) / 2 points to buy 1 Level
Characters get 86 Skill points to raise up any Skills they want.

LVL = Skill Level
BASE = LVL + STAT

You have 800eb to spend specifically on Fashion and Fashionware.

p. 105 / What about Lifestyle & Housing?
p. 118 / Run out of cash? To sell your soul for more money…

For cyberware with a foundational requirement (i.e. a Cybereye) check the box to indicate you have it. Options go in the slots below.
For cyberware without a foundational requirement (i.e. Internal Cyberware) just note each piece in the slots below the category name.
